'''Terminate This Treacherous Transport!''' is a [[Random Event]] World Quest that can occur in [[Sumeru]].

==Steps==
# Defeat the [[Treasure Hoarders]]
#* Defeating the Sumpter Beast is not necessary since it runs away after charging the player once.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Paimon:''' Are those... the Treasure Hoarders and their [[Sumpter Beast]]s? What a smorgasbord of supplies they're carrying!
:'''Paimon:''' Without these supplies, they should be kept down for a good while &mdash; Paimon's leaving the job to you, then!
{{Dialogue end}}
